roleset.name: impelled action

example.name: order-v: passivized
example.text: [Commonwealth Edison]-1 was ordered *trace-1* *trace-2* torefund about $250 million to its current and former ratepayers.
example.arg: *trace-2* to refund about $250 million to its current and former ratepayers

example.name: order-n: autogen1
example.text: they defied his order to extend the school year by several weeksto make up for time lost during a teachers ' strike
example.arg: to extend the school year by several weeks to make up for time lost during a teachers ' strike

example.name: order-n: autogen2
example.text: buy orders from major brokerage firms to match the selling flood

example.name: order-n: args 0 and 2 etc
example.text: his orders of execution of hundreds of people in 1991 during the Shiite Muslim uprising
example.arg: of execution of hundreds of people

roleset.name: request to be delivered

example.name: order-v: valentines day
example.text: Ever the romantic, John ordered a dozen dandelions for Mary from Bubba's Flower shop.

example.name: order-n: autogen1
example.text: it received an order from Martinair Holland for four model767-300 wide-body jetliners valued at a total of about $326million
example.arg: for four model 767-300 wide-body jetliners valued at a total of about $ 326 million

example.name: order-n: Creepy creepy creepy
example.text: *PRO* Place a phone order through most any catalog and chances are the clerk who answers wo n't be the only one on the line

roleset.name: placement

example.name: order-n: with arg1
example.text: his own place in the order of things

roleset.name: neat

example.name: orderly-j
example.text: She was orderly with her home, always kept clean and in order....never overdone with needless furnishings or gawdiness.
